product_name: SIGMA SPORT Illux Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its 3 super bright LEDs, the small, lightweight SIGMA SPORT Illux Front Bike Light provides good light at close range and boosts your visibility during any ride. Light features a steady and flashing mode that provides 40 hours of run time on the included 3 AAA batteries. SIGMA SPORT Illux Front Bike Light has a special reflective design that's visible from 3 sides to enhance safety. Click switch; tool-free mounting fits 22-32mm bars; water resistant; 28g weight. Closeout.
